item.title: Prj701 5 ~ Proxmox
item.description: Project 701 ~ Proxmox Networking is one of the IT sectors that I have yet to spend much time in. My only exposure has been a NET501 class where we covered the basics of things like booting a virtual machine, routers/IPs, certificates, dhcp, and a few others. Since then I haven’t really touched anything to do with networking except for creation/use of virtual machines on the cloud platforms (GCP, AWS and Azure).
